Invitation

Get ready, nerds! Garage Trip is back, again. Version 6.9 this year ... nice.
With our history of epic gatherings, we’re excited to bring another unforgettable week of fun, games, and geeky goodness, again.
We've got everything, again: from mind-bending puzzles to thrilling video games.
And this year, it’s kid-friendly, again.

So mark your calendars.
Gather your friends. And prepare for a week of pure nerdy joy.
See you there, again!?
